targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(sensei_user_id) FROM sensei_users LIMIT 50

WITH daily_counts AS (
    SELECT 
        DATE_TRUNC('day', joined_at) AS joined_date,
        COUNT(*) AS daily_count
    FROM sensei_users
    GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('day', joined_at)
),
running_totals AS (
    SELECT 
        joined_date,
        daily_count,
        SUM(daily_count) OVER (ORDER BY joined_date) AS running_total
    FROM daily_counts
)
SELECT date(joined_date) as join_date, running_total
FROM running_totals
WHERE joined_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL '21 days'
ORDER BY joined_date;

SELECT 
    DATE(joined_at) AS join_date, 
    COUNT(*) AS new_users
FROM 
    sensei_users 
WHERE 
    joined_at >= (CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days')  -- Ensures the oldest date is a full day
GROUP BY 
    DATE(joined_at)
ORDER BY 
    DATE(joined_at);

WITH hours AS (
    SELECT generate_series(
        DATE_TRUNC('hour', NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'), 
        DATE_TRUNC('hour', NOW()), 
        INTERVAL '1 hour'
    ) AS hour
)
SELECT 
    h.hour AS join_date_hour,
    COALESCE(COUNT(su.joined_at), 0) AS new_users
FROM hours h
LEFT JOIN sensei_users su
    ON DATE_TRUNC('hour', su.joined_at) = h.hour
WHERE su.joined_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
   OR su.joined_at IS NULL
GROUP BY h.hour
ORDER BY h.hour;

WITH weekly_users AS (
    -- Get weekly new users and cumulative total users
    SELECT 
        DATE_TRUNC('week', joined_at) AS event_week,
        COUNT(sensei_user_id) AS new_users,
        SUM(COUNT(sensei_user_id)) OVER (ORDER BY DATE_TRUNC('week', joined_at)) AS total_users
    FROM 
        sensei_users
    GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('week', joined_at)
),
active_chess_players AS (
    -- Count unique users who played a game in a given event week after joining
    SELECT 
        DATE_TRUNC('week', g.game_date) AS event_week,
        COUNT(DISTINCT g.sensei_user_id) AS active_users
    FROM 
        games g
    JOIN 
        sensei_users su ON g.sensei_user_id = su.sensei_user_id
    WHERE 
        su.joined_at <= g.game_date  -- Exclude games played before the user joined
    GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('week', g.game_date)
),
previously_active_users AS (
    -- Identify users who had at least one event in any previous week
    SELECT 
        e.sensei_user_id,
        MIN(DATE_TRUNC('week', e.event_timestamp)) AS first_event_week
    FROM 
        events e
    GROUP BY 
        e.sensei_user_id
),
weekly_sensei_active_users AS (
    -- Count users who played a game in the current week AND had an event in the same week
    -- but also had an event in any previous week
    SELECT 
        DATE_TRUNC('week', g.game_date) AS event_week,
        COUNT(DISTINCT g.sensei_user_id) AS sensei_active_users
    FROM 
        games g
    JOIN 
        events e ON g.sensei_user_id = e.sensei_user_id 
            AND DATE_TRUNC('week', g.game_date) = DATE_TRUNC('week', e.event_timestamp)  -- Same week
    JOIN 
        previously_active_users p ON g.sensei_user_id = p.sensei_user_id
            AND p.first_event_week < DATE_TRUNC('week', g.game_date)  -- Ensure they had an event in a previous week
    GROUP BY 
        DATE_TRUNC('week', g.game_date)
)
SELECT 
    date(wu.event_week) as event_week,
    wu.total_users,
    COALESCE(acp.active_users, 0) AS active_chess_players, -- Users who played games that week
    CASE 
        WHEN COALESCE(wu.total_users, 0) = 0 THEN 0
        ELSE ROUND((COALESCE(acp.active_users, 0)::DECIMAL / NULLIF(wu.total_users, 0)) * 100, 2)
    END AS chess_player_pct, -- % of total users who played a game      
    COALESCE(wsau.sensei_active_users, 0) AS active_sensei_users, -- Users who played chess that week and signed up to sensei chess in a prior week (not new users)
    CASE 
        WHEN COALESCE(acp.active_users, 0) = 0 THEN 0
        ELSE ROUND((COALESCE(wsau.sensei_active_users, 0)::DECIMAL / NULLIF(acp.active_users, 0)) * 100, 2)
    END AS sensei_engagement_percentage -- % of active chess players who are sensei active users
FROM 
    weekly_users wu
LEFT JOIN 
    active_chess_players acp ON wu.event_week = acp.event_week
LEFT JOIN 
    weekly_sensei_active_users wsau ON wu.event_week = wsau.event_week
WHERE 
    wu.event_week >= DATE '2025-01-01'
ORDER BY 
    wu.event_week desc;

WITH user_days AS (
    SELECT 
        e.sensei_user_id,
        COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(e.event_timestamp)) AS days_with_events
    FROM 
        events e
    JOIN 
        sensei_users su ON e.sensei_user_id = su.sensei_user_id
    WHERE su.sensei_user_id > 2
--    AND joined_at >= '2024-12-30'
    GROUP BY 
        e.sensei_user_id
), total_users AS (
    SELECT COUNT(sensei_user_id) AS total_user_count 
    FROM sensei_users 
    WHERE joined_at >= '2024-12-30'
)
SELECT 
    ud.days_with_events,
    COUNT(ud.sensei_user_id) AS user_count,
    ROUND((COUNT(ud.sensei_user_id) * 100.0) / tu.total_user_count, 2) AS user_percentage
FROM 
    user_days ud
JOIN 
    total_users tu ON 1=1
GROUP BY 
    ud.days_with_events, tu.total_user_count
ORDER BY 
    ud.days_with_events;

select count(*) from sensei_users
where sensei_user_id in (select sensei_user_id from account_links)

select count(distinct sensei_user_id) from account_links
where site = 'chesscom'

select count(distinct sensei_user_id) from account_links
where site = 'lichess'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS user_count
FROM (
    SELECT sensei_user_id
    FROM account_links
    WHERE site IN ('chesscom', 'lichess')
    GROUP BY sensei_user_id
    HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT site) = 2
) subquery;

select count(*) from sensei_users
where sensei_user_id not in (select sensei_user_id from account_links)

select count(*) from sensei_users
where sensei_user_id not in (select sensei_user_id from account_links)
and sensei_user_id in (select sensei_user_id from events where event_data->>'page' = 'profile')

panels.title: Users Without Account Links who visited the Profile Page

targets.rawSql:
select count(*) from sensei_users
where sensei_user_id not in (select sensei_user_id from account_links)
and sensei_user_id not in (select sensei_user_id from events where event_data->>'page' = 'profile')

panels.title: Users Without Account Links and never visited the Profile Page

targets.rawSql:
select
location->>'latitude' as latitude,
location->>'longitude' as longitude,
location->>'city' as city,
location->>'country_name' as country,
count(distinct sensei_user_id) as user_count
from events 
where sensei_user_id > 0
group by latitude, longitude, city, country

select
location->>'city' as city,
location->>'country_name' as country,
count(distinct sensei_user_id) as user_count
from events 
where sensei_user_id > 0
group by city,country
order by user_count desc

targets.expr:
sum by (lat, lon, city_name, country_name) (
  count_over_time({instance="ingress-nginx-external"} 
  | json 
  | lat != ""
  | vhost = `senseichess.com` or vhost = `www.senseichess.com`
  | city_name != `Jersey City`
  |__error__=``[$__range])
) > 20

sum by(city_name, country_name) (count_over_time({instance="ingress-nginx-external"} 
| json 
| country_name != ``
| status = `200` 
| vhost = `senseichess.com` or vhost = `www.senseichess.com`
| city_name != `Jersey City`
| __error__=`` [24h]))

sum by(country_name) (count_over_time({instance="ingress-nginx-external"} 
| json 
| country_name != `` 
| vhost = `senseichess.com` or vhost = `www.senseichess.com`
| city_name != `Jersey City`
| status = `200`
| __error__=`` [24h]))

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) job_status from job_queue  where job_status = 'queued'
SELECT COUNT(*) job_status from job_queue  where job_status = 'processing'
SELECT COUNT(*) job_status from job_queue  where job_status = 'completed'

select 
job_type, 
count(*) filter (where job_status = 'queued') as queued,
count(*) filter (where job_status = 'processing') as processing,
count(*) filter (where job_status = 'completed') as completed,
count(*) filter (where job_status = 'failed') as failed
from job_queue 
group by job_type
order by job_type

SELECT 
  date_trunc('hour', updated_at) AS job_hour, 
  COUNT(*) AS job_count
FROM job_queue
WHERE job_status = 'failed'
  AND job_type = 'analysis'
  and updated_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '96 hours'
GROUP BY job_hour
ORDER BY job_hour desc;
